posts.post_title: WTB T206 Seymour Drum/Pied fact42/Red Hindu/Lenox
posts.post_content:
Looking for the "throwing" pose only... im looking to complete the back collection for this very difficult player that has alot of the super hard backs..

Any Help would be huge :) ... even just pointing me in the direction of someone who owns one would be nice so I could throw out an offer...

Jamie
